title: About NextGen
metaDescription: Learn about NextGen, a non-partisan youth movement focused on civic education, voter participation, and community building in Nigeria.
body:
About NextGen

A non-partisan movement empowering young Nigerians to participate in civic life and shape the future of our democracy.

What We Are

NextGen is a grassroots youth movement dedicated to strengthening democracy in Nigeria through civic education, voter mobilization, and community organizing. We believe that young people have the power to transform our society when they are informed, engaged, and organized.

Founded by and for young Nigerians, we provide the tools, resources, and community support needed to turn civic awareness into meaningful action. We are non-partisan, transparent, and committed to long-term systemic change.

What We Are Not

We are not a political party. NextGen does not endorse candidates or align with any political party. Our focus is on empowering citizens, not promoting politicians.

We are not a protest movement. While we support the right to peaceful assembly, our work centers on sustainable civic engagement, education, and community building.

We are not exclusive. NextGen welcomes all young Nigerians who are committed to democratic values, regardless of background, ethnicity, religion, or political affiliation.

Our Values

Transparency

We operate openly and honestly, with clear communication about our goals, methods, and funding.

Inclusivity

We create space for all young Nigerians to participate, learn, and lead regardless of their background.

Integrity

We hold ourselves to the highest ethical standards and expect the same from our leaders and institutions.

Impact

We focus on measurable, sustainable change that improves civic participation and strengthens democracy.

Join the Movement

Be part of a generation that refuses to sit on the sidelines.

Join NextGen

title: What We Do
metaDescription: Learn about NextGen's civic education programs, youth mobilization, community organizing, and voter awareness initiatives.
body:
What We Do

Building a movement of informed, engaged young citizens through education, mobilization, and community action.

üìö

Civic Education

We provide accessible, non-partisan civic education to help young Nigerians understand their rights, responsibilities, and the democratic process. Through workshops, online resources, and community sessions, we break down complex political concepts into actionable knowledge.

  • Constitutional rights and civic responsibilities
  • How government works at local, state, and federal levels
  • Understanding electoral processes and voting procedures
  • Media literacy and identifying misinformation
üì¢

Youth Mobilization

We organize and mobilize young people to participate actively in democratic processes. From voter registration drives to town halls with elected officials, we create opportunities for youth voices to be heard and counted.

  • Voter registration and turnout campaigns
  • Youth-led town halls and public forums
  • Advocacy training and leadership development
  • Coalition building with other civic organizations
ü§ù

Community Organizing

We support young people in organizing their communities around local issues that matter. By building grassroots networks and providing organizing tools, we help youth turn concern into collective action.

  • Community needs assessment and issue identification
  • Organizing skills training and mentorship
  • Building local youth civic networks
  • Connecting communities with resources and support
üó≥Ô∏è

Voter Awareness

We run comprehensive voter awareness campaigns to ensure young Nigerians have the information they need to participate fully in elections. Our work is strictly non-partisan, focused on empowering voters, not influencing their choices.

  • Voter registration assistance and deadlines
  • Polling location information and accessibility
  • Understanding ballot measures and candidates
  • Election day support and voter protection

title: Get Involved
metaDescription: Join the NextGen movement. Volunteer, advocate, and support youth civic engagement in Nigeria.
body:
Get Involved

There are many ways to participate in building a stronger democracy. Find the path that works for you.

Volunteer

Join our volunteer network and contribute your time and skills to civic education, voter registration drives, community organizing, and event support.

Sign Up to Volunteer

Advocate

Use your voice to promote civic participation in your community. Share resources, organize discussions, and encourage your peers to get involved.

Join as an Advocate

Organize

Lead civic initiatives in your community. We provide training, resources, and support for young people who want to organize around local issues.

Become an Organizer

Support

Help sustain our work through donations, partnerships, or by connecting us with resources and opportunities in your network.

Support NextGen

What to Expect

Training & Resources

Access civic education materials, organizing toolkits, and skill-building workshops to help you make an impact.

Community Support

Connect with other young people who share your commitment to civic engagement and democratic values.

Real Impact

Participate in campaigns and initiatives that create measurable change in voter turnout, civic awareness, and community organizing.

Ready to Get Started?

Join NextGen today and become part of the solution.
